text: <@UCJANAW1Y> in this particular example, there are a variety of company locations that need to show dynamic pages based on that location.

What is the data in the table comprised of?

The limit for it is 10 which is the issue you're running into

Hi All, is there a way to call the meta description in hubl? What I only see is content and truncate it. i don't want to truncate things, i really wanted to call the meta description. Is there any other hubl aside from

``` {{ content.post_list_content|truncatehtml(100) }}```

Hi

You can try using {{ content.meta_description  }}
